verbose_text: XREF_BIBR In light of the retinal phenotype we observed in affected individuals with POC1B mutations and the reported smaller eyes in poc1b morphant zebrafish, we disrupted poc1b expression by using the same translation blocking MO used by Pearson et al. XREF_BIBR An accurate evaluation of Poc1b function in the eyes indeed confirmed that the protein is required for normal vision, given that the Poc1b depleted zebrafish showed a severely decreased OKR in combination with smaller eyes (XREF_FIG C).
